pageContext.claim: “I got a bad hand with all these horrible trade deals, NAFTA is a disaster, Mexico is going to make over one hundred billion dollars in the United States this year.”
pageContext.analysis: Counting goods and services, the trade deficit with Mexico was $64.1 billion in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative. Moreover, countries do not "lose" money on trade deficits -- or "make" money on trade surpluses.
